idea-plugin.name: Sui Move Language
idea-plugin.description:
This plugin provides enhanced support for Sui Move, a language tailored for blockchain development. It bolsters coding efficiency and workflow with a suite of features:

  • Efficient Syntax Highlighting: For improved code clarity and error reduction.
  • Advanced Code Formatting: To maintain a uniform code structure.
  • Go-to-Definition: For effortless code navigation.
  • Automatic Type Inference: For concise coding with smart type predictions.
  • Execute Custom Commands: Customizable to fit project-specific needs.
  • Quick Access Buttons: To expedite development tasks.
  • Seamless sui Binary Integration: For smooth interaction with Sui Move tools.

The plugin also allows for environment customization through the Sui Cli Path and includes a dedicated ToolWindow for effective project management. Maintain optimal performance by keeping the plugin up to date.

Features are designed to boost coding efficiency and workflow.

  • Efficient Syntax Highlighting: Improves code readability and reduces errors.
  • Advanced Code Formatting: Ensures a clean, consistent codebase.
  • Go-to-Definition: Eases navigation within your codebase.

  • Execute Custom Commands: Tailor functionality to project needs.
  • Quick Access Buttons: Accelerate your development process.
  • Seamless sui Binary Integration: Integrates smoothly with Sui Move tools.

Customize your environment with the Sui Cli Path and a dedicated ToolWindow for efficient project management.

Stay compatible and up-to-date with the plugin for optimal performance.

Usage

Set the Sui Cli Path

Go to Settings > Languages & Frameworks > Sui Move Language, select the sui cli path.

Using the ToolWindow

The ToolWindow offers several functionalities:

  • Refresh Project: Synchronizes the latest project state.

  • Get Active Address: Displays current active address.

  • Switch Account: Switch between different accounts.

  • Switch Network: Switch between networks, like development to test.

Execute Custom Command

Configure custom commands in Edit Configurations in the toolbar.

Add Sui Command, set name, command. Use the Run Button button to execute.

You can also add another blockchain cli commands in the Configuration List.

Click the Move to add a new customer configuration.

Its configuration process is similar to Sui Command.

Note: Ensure the working directory is in the current project.

Issues or feature requests? Visit our GitHub repository.
